summary.span: 管理用户配置文件和配置文件事件的创建。

span.span: Manages the creation of the user profile and profile events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用用户配置文件后，ASP.NET 将使用 创建用户配置文件，并将其存储在 当前的属性中 。When the user profile is enabled, ASP.NET uses the to create the user profile and store it in the property of the current . 公开以下事件，你可以处理这些事件，以在应用程序中配置身份验证：The exposes the following events you can handle to configure authentication in your application: - 事件，用于在匿名用户登录时将配置文件设置从匿名配置文件迁移到经过身份验证的配置文件。The event, to migrate profile settings from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when an anonymous user logs in. - 事件，用于自定义用户配置文件的创建方式。The event, to customize how the user profile is created. - 事件，用于控制在属性设置为时如何保存用户配置文件 `true` 。The event, to control how the user profile is saved when the property is set to `true`. 有关启用用户配置文件的信息，请参阅 [Profile 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)。For information about enabling the user profile, see [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd). ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 Web.config 文件，该文件启用支持匿名用户的匿名标识和配置文件属性。The following example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 该 事件将配置文件属性值从匿名配置文件复制到当前用户的配置文件。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码调用。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. 当 ASP.NET 应用程序启动时创建。An is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 调用 构造函数以为 应用程序创建。The calls the constructor to create the for the application. 在应用程序的配置中指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MigrateAnonymous As ProfileMigrateEventHandler

summary.span: 当配置文件的匿名用户登录时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the anonymous user for a profile logs in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以 使用全局事件访问 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中的类的事件 `Profile_MigrateAnonymous` ，如本主题的示例中所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application by using the `Profile_MigrateAnonymous` global event, as shown in the example for this topic. 当使用你的应用程序登录的用户进行登录时，你可以使用事件将配置文件属性值从匿名配置文件复制到经过身份验证的配置文件。You can use the event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when a user who has been anonymously using your application logs in. 当已启用用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，ASP.NET 将创建一个类型为的新类 `ProfileCommon` ，该类继承自 类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型访问器将添加到 `ProfileCommon` 在配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 使用 `GetProfile` 方法，可以根据用户名来检索 `ProfileCommon` 对象。A `GetProfile` method enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 可以使用 `GetProfile` 当前经过身份验证的配置文件的方法来检索匿名配置文件的属性值。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current, authenticated profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 然后，可以将匿名属性值复制到经过身份验证的用户的当前配置文件。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 Web.config 文件，该文件启用支持匿名用户的匿名标识和配置文件属性。The following example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 该 事件将配置文件属性值从匿名配置文件复制到当前用户的配置文件。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Personalize As ProfileEventHandler

summary.span: 在创建用户配置文件之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user profile is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件 在事件期间引发 。The event is raised during the event. 你可以 使用全局事件访问 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中的类的事件， `Profile_Personalize` 如本主题的示例中所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application using the `Profile_Personalize` global event as shown in the example for this topic. 可以使用 事件指定自定义用户配置文件。You can use the event to specify a custom user profile. 如果为 事件的事件处理程序指定的属性值 设置为在事件结束时不为的值 `null` ，则 将使用属性的指定值 作为当前的属性的值 。If the property value specified for the event handler for the event is set to a value that is not `null` when the event ends, then the will use the specified value of the property as the value of the property of the current . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 在应用程序的 global.asax 文件中声明的事件。The following code example shows the event declared in the Global.asax file for an application. 事件代码基于角色成员身份加载用户的用户配置文件。The event code loads a user profile for a user based on role membership. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize/CS/global.asax#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize/VB/global.asax#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ProfileAutoSaving As ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler

summary.span: 在启用自动配置文件保存的情况下在页面执行结束时发生。

span.span: Occurs at the end of page execution if automatic profile saving is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为，则在页执行结束时引发事件 `true` 。The event is raised at the end of page execution if the property is `true`. 你可以 使用全局事件访问 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中的类的事件 `Profile_ProfileAutoSaving` ，如本主题的示例中所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application using the `Profile_ProfileAutoSaving` global event, as shown in the example for this topic. 方法检查 用户配置文件中每个的属性值， 以确定是否已更改由基元类型、字符串或对象组成的属性 。The method checks the property value for each in the user profile to determine whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed. 方法不能显式确定自定义类是否已更改。The method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed. 您可以使用 事件来确定自定义对象是否已更改，然后继续自动保存已修改的对象，或者在未修改任何对象时取消自动保存。You can use the event to determine whether a custom object has been changed and then either to continue with the automatic save for modified objects or to cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 若要取消自动配置文件保存操作，请 在事件中将属性设置为 `false` ; 否则，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the property to `false` in the event; otherwise, set the property to `true`. 此事件可能有多个订户 。There may be multiple subscribers to the event. 将使用属性设置为的最后一个值 。The will use the last value that the property is set to. 因此，建议您在 无论是取消还是继续自动保存的情况下，显式设置该属性，因为您可能需要覆盖由早期订阅服务器设置的值。As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the property in the event whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/CS/global.asax#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/VB/global.asax#11)]
